arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صِيَامِيْ فِيْهِ صِيَامَ الصَّائِمِيْنَ
وَهَبْ لِيْ جُرْمِيْ فِيْهِ يَا إِلٰهَ العَالَمِيْنَ
وَاعْفُ عَنِّيْ يَا عَافِيًا عَنِ المُجْرِمِيْنَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] decide my fasting to be as same as the fasting of the true fasters,
And decide my acts of worships to be as same as the worship of the worshippers.
And (please] awaken me from the slumber of the inadvertent ones.
And excuse my offense on this day, O the God of the worlds.
And (please] pardon me; O He Who pardons the offender.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
wahab lī jur-mī fīhi yā ilāhal `ālamīn
